Hydras:

Hydras's face frowned and said "Be ready and when you have them close open 
fire at my command"

-----Original Message----- 
From: Super Cyclonus
Sent: Sunday, December 19, 2010 4:28 PM
To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com
Subject: Re: The wrath of the Hydra/The return of a decepticon

Strika and her team left Hydras at the edge of the city, her optics
watching him thoughtfully at the gate, her arms folded behind her
back.

The trip back to Hydras' shuttle and then back towards the tower was
swift and turbulant. As the shuttle was pushed to its max, it rocked
through the air, a stream of red trailing behind it as the atmosphere
behind it smoked from the speed.

In the distance Hydras could see his tower, small flickers of light
showing the firefight that was happening.

"Sir." Tarantulus said, "Maximal and Autobot signatures ahead. There
is a firefight going on!"

Meanwhile a call came in from Cyclonus, "All available troops have
been dispatched. Deepstryke and Phobia, plus several more of Scourge's
sweeps. I am about to use Scourge and the last sweeps in to assist. We
will try to hold until you get here."

(NEXT POSTS in the thread OPERATION BLACK TOWER)

Preston
